## Figures

Using ggplot in three ways 

```{r, fig.show='hold'}
ggplot2::ggplot(KuangHuangyingTools::cleanData,ggplot2::aes(x = Petal.Length, y = Petal.Width
                        )) + ggplot2::geom_line()
ggplot2::ggplot(KuangHuangyingTools::cleanData,ggplot2::aes(x = Petal.Length, y = Petal.Width,
                         color = Species)) + ggplot2::geom_point()
ggplot2::ggplot(KuangHuangyingTools::cleanData,ggplot2::aes(x = Petal.Length, y = Petal.Width)) +
  ggplot2::geom_point() + ggplot2::facet_wrap(~ Species)
```
